    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="de">Zenitalregen</string>
            <string language="en">Zenital Rain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pluie de Zenital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chuva De Zenital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pioggia Di Zenital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βροχή Zenital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lluvia De Zenital</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Mithilfe einer grafischen Darstellung soll die Entstehung von Zinitalregen erklärt werden. Hierzu müssen vorgegeben Sätze in die richtige Reihenfolge gebracht werden. Weiterführende Fragen.</string>
            <string language="en">Explain the development of zenital rain correctly by means of a diagram. Put the sentences supplied in correct order. Further questions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tropen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Zenitalregen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Regen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Regenwald</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tropics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Zenitalregen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rain forest</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquez le développement de la pluie zenital 
correctement au moyen d'un diagramme. Mettez les phrases 
fournies dans la commande correcte. D'autres questions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explique o desenvolvimento da chuva zenital 
corretamente por meio de um diagrama. Ponha as sentenças 
fornecidas na ordem correta. Perguntas mais adicionais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spieghi correttamente lo sviluppo di pioggia 
zenital per mezzo di uno schema. Metta le frasi fornite 
nell'ordine corretto. Ulteriori domande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξηγήστε την ανάπτυξη της zenital βροχής σωστά με 
τη βοήθεια ενός διαγράμματος. Βάλτε τις προτάσεις που 
παρέχονται στη σωστή κατάταξη. Περαιτέρω ερωτήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explique el desarrollo de la lluvia zenital 
correctamente por medio de un diagrama. Ponga las sentencias 
provistas en orden correcta. Otras preguntas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zenitalregen</string>
